segments.text: Let me ask some questions . Do you know what people need to get entry into China ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . An passport and a visa are necessary for entry into China .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What materials do they need in order to apply the passport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They should fill in an application form , hand in the copies of Identification Card and household register .
segments.speaker: S2
